title: Alter Self
data:
{{obsolete}} {{NISpell |name=Alter Self |level=7 |school1={{Transmutations}} |school2= |school3= |sources=
* [[Book of Transfigurations]] * [[Book of Morphology]]
}} {{Flavour|This spell causes aberrations to form in the caster's body, leaving the caster in a weakened state (though it was not fatal in and of itself). It may fail to affect those who are already heavily mutated.}} '''Alter Self''' is a level 7 [[Transmutations]] spell which gives random [[mutation]], much like eating a fresh mutagenic chunk. This spell also damages your health, but could not kill you directly. You cannot cast this spell if your HP was too low. ==Strategy== This spell is tedious; the best way to use this spell is to go to the [[Temple]], cast it, cast [[Necromutation]] (so you don't starve), rest, and repeat, until you get a decent mutation set. Alternatively, you can [[Fulsome Distillation|distill]] a few mutation potions (gives more than 1 at a time), draw a [[Helix card]] (better chance of a good mutation), or worship [[Jiyva]], who tends to give good mutations and a way to get rid of bad mutations. ==History== *Alter Self was removed in [[0.9]].
